channel.title: I have a slight problem
channel.description:
I'm wanting to change my home area but at the same time i wanna get rid of my portals that are at my current home.
Is there some kind of tut. on that?

item.title: I have a slight problem
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

home u yust go to another place and start building with adding npcs , and globals?
at the portals i gave a guide, in another topic resently (5minsago)
if u dont know how to change the coords of your home
look for // initial x and y coordinates of the player in your PLAYER.java
to change the coords of your “home” yust go to your clickingmost.java and look for the coords and change them .

please dont dubble post topics that are “olmost” The same.

Read full topic
